H0.text: English novelist Barbara McCorquodale was better known by what name. Barbara Windsor

H1.text: English novelist Barbara McCorquodale was better known by what name. Barbara Taylor Bradford

H2.text: English novelist Barbara McCorquodale was better known by what name. Barbara Vine

H3.text: English novelist Barbara McCorquodale was better known by what name. Barbara Cartland

A4.text: Barbara Taylor Bradford was a British-American best-selling novelist.

A5.text: Barbara Taylor Bradford wrote 40 novels, often about young women of humble beginnings who rise through their hard work in business.
